# [Story] ORB-063: Implement organic-to-ad derivation

## Parent Epic

Parent: #521 (Content-to-Ads)

## Description

Build system to convert high-performing organic posts into ad creatives while preserving engagement proof, with intelligent targeting suggestions and budget recommendations.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] One-click conversion of organic post to ad creative format
- [ ] Engagement proof preservation showing original likes, comments, shares
- [ ] AI-powered targeting suggestions based on engaged audience analysis
- [ ] Budget recommendations based on reach goals and historical performance
- [ ] Creative adaptation for different ad placements and formats

## Technical Notes

- Use platform APIs to fetch original post with engagement data intact
- Implement audience lookalike creation based on engagers
- Create format-specific adaptations (story, feed, reels) from single source
